Bat King has a unique game play! Fly inside caves, castles, cemeteries and grab all blood drops you can get. Grab some ruby orbs and fly against the clock!

Package size: 32 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)

Cafe Game Studio

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
